debutant.description: Learn to recognize patterns in opponents' strokes and adjust your positioning accordingly.

intermediaire.description: Anticipate opponents' serve returns and adjust your positioning accordingly.

avance.description: Anticipate opponents' swings and adjust your positioning accordingly.

exercices_complementaires.description: Recognize patterns in opponents' strokes and adjust your positioning accordingly. Start with slow, controlled movements and gradually increase speed and complexity.

metriques_progression.description: Set targets for yourself to anticipate opponents' strokes and adjust your positioning accordingly. Gradually increase the difficulty of these targets as you improve.

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Avoid misjudging opponents' strokes and adjust your positioning accordingly. Practice recognizing patterns in opponents' strokes to improve anticipation.
